thread.title: Kenny B.
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Kenny B.

author: Kenny B.
title: Kenny B.
text: I was recently introduced to Bundle Stars. The friend showed me an awesome bundle for Batman games. I didn't buy it. But after seeing the prices, I decided to sign-up. Glad I did, because I enjoyed a great discount on Brink. Paid for copies to get enough for my gaming group of friends.
